extension.summary: Cypers Locker Repo - Home to Project Cypher
extension.description: Cypers Locker Repo - Home to Project Cypher.
Cypher 16 Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Cypher 16 Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Cypher 16 Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Cypher 16 Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Cypher 16 Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Cypher 16 Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Cypher 16 Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Cypher 16 Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
Cypher 16 complètement revu pour créer une apparence moderne, en gardant l'impression classique d'Aeon.
Cypher 16 complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Cypher 16 עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Cypher 16 Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Cypher 16 Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Cypher 16 Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Cypher 16 Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
Cypher 16 고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Cypher 16 pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Cypher 16 Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Cypher 16 Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Cypher 16 Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Cypher 16 Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Cypher 16 Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Cypher 16 Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Cypher 16 полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Cypher 16 Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Cypher 16 Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
Cypher 16 การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Cypher 16 Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.

extension.summary: ...Cypher Gaming... Please Have Chrome Browser installed on your system, download from playstore or from https://www.google.com/chrome/ For Windows or Mac Sytems Only!
extension.description: ...Cypher Gaming... Please Have Chrome Browser installed on your system, download from playstore or from https://www.google.com/chrome/ For Windows or Mac Sytems Only! Cypher Gaming Code used under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
Cypher Builds Wizard allows you to get access to the latest Cypher Media Builds.
Cypher Speed Tester powered by speedtest.net will give you accurate Internet speed/ping test results. \n Brought to you by Cypher Media

Web Viewer is a linear text web browser. It is linear because it doesn't render pages, it filters them and displays text in the order it is found in the original HTML.
Web viewer also allows addon developers to process application authorization (ie. facebook,flickr etc.) with little programming and without violating terms of use.
What it does: *You can follow links, fill out forms, view images *Stream video/audio links *It has back/forward history *Bookmarks
What it doesn't do: *Handle style sheets, javascript, flash, etc. *Make web pages look good :) *Lots of other stuff
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Live SD and HD TV channels
extension.description: General disclaimer: Project Cypher takes no responsibility for the content or reliability of the feeds. Project Cypher [B]Does Not[/B] host any of the feeds or Streams. Most of the Code from this addon was taken from many other addons but used under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
BBC 3 VOD Content Hosted By YouTube.

extension.summary: One click TV Shows By Cypher
extension.description: One click TV Shows By Cypher from watch-episodes, We do not host any of the files within this Addon, we are in no way affiliated with KODI, Based on Code by metalkettle
9anime is HD source for almost all animes
VOD Content Hosted By YouTube.
Use this addon to play F4m v1 and v2 streams
Renegades RSS screensaver will shows you the Latest Football Games and what Channels they are on... other feeds can be added from within the addon settings
YouTube is a one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist ein eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube a világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Добавка за облици, която осигурява просто управление и списък с потребителски преки пътища (изисква поддръжка от облика)
Add-on für Skins für einfache Bearbeitung und Auflistung von benutzerdefinierten Verknüpfungen (erfordert Skin-Unterstützung)
Πρόσθετο για κελύφη, το οποίο παρέχει έναν απλό τρόπο διαχείρισης και κατηγοριοποίησης των συντομεύσεων του χρήστη (πρέπει να υποστηρίζεται από το κέλυφος)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Complemento para las pieles para proporcionar una gestión sencilla y lista de atajos de usuario (requiere que la piel lo soporte)
Addiciel pour habillages qui fournit une gestion simple et un listage des raccourcis utilisateurs (exige la prise en charge de l'habillage)
Complemento que fornece aos temas dunha xestión sinxela dos atallos dos usuarios (require soporte do tema)
Dodatak za presvlake koja omogućava jednostavno upravljanje i prikaz korisnikovih prečaca (zahtijeva podršku presvlake)
Felszín kiegészítő amely könnyen kezelhetővé és listázhatóvá teszi a felhasználói parancsikonokat (Felszín támogatás szükséges)
Viðbót fyrir viðmót til að halda utan um flýtivísa og fá yfirlit yfir þá (þarfnast stuðnings frá viðmóti)
Add-on per gli skin per consentire un facile gestione ed elenco delle scorciatoie utente (richiede che lo skin lo supporti)
Priedas teminėms išvaizdoms, kad jos turėtų galimybę paprastai tvarkyti ir atvaizduoti vartotojo sukurtas nuorodas (reikalingas teminės išvaizdos palaikymas)
Add-on voor skins om te voorzien in het eenvoudig beheren en sorteren van gebruikers snelkoppelingen (vereist skin ondersteuning)
Tillegg for enkel administrering og opplisting av bruker-snarveier i tema (krever støtte i tema)
Wtyczka dla skór, która zapewnia proste zarządzanie i tworzenie list skrótów użytkownika (wymaga wsparcia skóry)
Um add-on que permite que os temas tenham recursos simples para gerir e listar atalhos de utilizadores (é necessário suporte do tema)
Add-on para que as skins possam prover gerenciamento de lista de atalhos para o menu principal (requer suporte da skin)
Дополнение для обложек, предоставляющее простой способ управления и список пользовательских ярлыков (требуется поддержка обложкой)
Skinntillägg som tillhandahåller enkel hantering och översikt av användargenvägar (om skinnet stöder det)
插件为皮肤提供了简单的管理和用户连接方式列表 (需要皮肤支持)
Last Version Made By Cypher, Fixed Images Loading, it may take a while for images to show please wait..

extension.news: This is the Last Version Made From [COLOR red][B]C0LD[/B][/COLOR][COLOR turquoise][B]FIRE[/B][/COLOR]. He'll not continue maintaining EXODUS anymore! Fixed missing sources, updated scrapers!

extension.description: Themes for Exodus are maintained separately to make distribution of the the addon itself easier/faster.
Metadata for Exodus are maintained separately to make distribution of the the addon itself easier/faster.

Easily Factory Restore your Kodi Configuration in One Simple Click! This tool will bring your Kodi back to its original installation state, deleting all customizations and add-ons you may have previously enabled, giving you a fresh start!
